name: The Coffee House
description:
The rain has caused the coffee and donut delivery services to crash. It is now your job to deliver the treats to the residents of "The Coffee House" and keep them happy. 

Move using WASD or the arrows. You can also use space bar to jump.

Coffee or Donuts will fly from the sides of the screen and when you are close to them, click the left mouse button to hit the treats towards your mouse. Try aim towards the residents calling for them through their windows. 

Coffee To deliver

Donut to deliver


Don't let the residents wait to long for their delivery though, they will become unhappy.  Don't let the treats hit the floor either. The residents' happiness is shown by the happiness bar. A successful delivery will increase the bar.

Try keep the residents happy for as long as possible and they happier they are the longer they are willing to wait for their delivery. Good Luck!

"The Coffee House" was made over the course of 5 Days for the 2022 Coffee Jam.  All code and art done by me and music created by Philip Schutte.
